attributes.action: Prevent businesses from making their workers sign a contract that forces them to claim to be "Self Employed".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many organisations claim to provide a "business opportunity" selling only their own products. Often the pricing and fee structure make it impossible for the supposedly "self employed" person to earn to the national minimum hourly wage. They also have no employee rights or protection regardless of how long they do the work.
